function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for respiratory droplet transmission of contagious diseases","Impact":"Spread of COVID-19 and other contagious diseases in built environments","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing and mask-wearing policies, proper ventilation, and sanitation protocols","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras for crowd monitoring, air purification systems, contactless payment systems","People":"Customers, service providers, employees","Owner":"Business owners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Challenges in managing human interactions in service venues","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission in high-traffic areas like grocery stores","Mitigation":"Implementing capacity limits, promoting online ordering and contactless pickup, providing protective barriers for staff","Technologies":"Online ordering and delivery platforms, queue management systems, transparent plastic shields","People":"Customers, service providers, employees","Owner":"Business owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Social acceptance and legitimacy of businesses in the context of social distancing","Impact":"Perception of legitimacy and acceptance by customers and society","Mitigation":"Aligning with institutional forces through regulatory compliance, professional body guidelines, and societal norms","Technologies":"Communication and PR tools, compliance tracking systems, customer feedback mechanisms","People":"Business owners, stakeholders, customers","Owner":"Business owners, management teams"}]}
